| confederation = CEV

The '''Czech Republic women's national volleyball team''' (Czech : České národní volejbalové družstvo žen) represents the Czech Republic in international women's volleyball competitions and friendly matches. The national team is organized by the Czech Volleyball Association (Czech : Český volejbalový svaz : ČVS) which is a member of the Federation of International Volleyball (FIVB) as well the European Volleyball Confederation (CEV). The national federation is also a part of the Middle European Volleyball Zonal Association (MEVZA).
Results
World Championship
*  1994 — 9th place
*  2002 — 19th place
*  2010 — 15th place
*  2022 — 18th place
*  2025 — 25th place
World Grand Prix
*  2013 — 14th place
*  2014 — 22nd place (Group 3)
*  2015 — 15th place (Group 2)
*  2016 — 18th place (Group 2)
*  2017 — 16th place (Group 2)
Nations League
*  2025 — 11th place
Challenger Cup
*  2018 — Did not qualify
*  2019 — 2nd 16px
*  2022 — 6th place
*  2023 — Did not qualify
